HomePage.title: Turn Photos into Coloring Pages
HomePage.subtitle: Use AI to convert any image into a printable coloring page.
HomePage.heroSubtitle: Create high-quality, black & white coloring sheets for kids and adults in seconds. Just describe it, and our AI draws it.
HomePage.inputLabel: What do you want to color?
HomePage.inputPlaceholder: e.g. A cute baby dragon eating ice cream...
HomePage.enterPrompt: Enter a prompt to start creating!
HomePage.noCommunityCreations: No community creations yet. Be the first!
HomePage.tryPrompts: Try: "A steampunk owl", "Underwater castle", "Kawaii cat in space"

Footer.description: The world's most advanced AI coloring page generator. Turn photos into coloring pages, create custom storybooks, and explore thousands of free printable sheets.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.p1: Welcome to AI Coloring Page, where imagination meets technology.
AboutPage.p2: Our mission is simple: To make creativity accessible to everyone.
AboutPage.p3: Whether you are a parent looking for a unique activity for your child, a teacher needing specific educational resources, or an adult seeking a moment of mindfulness, our tool is built for you.
AboutPage.p4: We realized that finding high-quality, specific coloring pages is hard. Most sites are filled with generic, low-resolution clips. We decided to use the power of Generative AI to let you create exactly what you want, when you want it.
AboutPage.p5: From turning your pet photo into a coloring page to generating a 'Cyberpunk Unicorn for Kids,' our engine handles it all.
AboutPage.p6: Thank you for using our tool. Happy coloring! üé®

PricingPage.title: Simple Pricing, Unlimited Creativity
PricingPage.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. Cancel anytime.

BlogPage.subtitle: Tips, tutorials, and inspiration for your coloring journey.
BlogPage.launchSubtitle: Turn photos into coloring pages and create your own storybooks. Discover the biggest update yet.
BlogPage.metaDescription: Learn about coloring techniques, best art supplies, and the benefits of coloring for mindfulness.

DirectoryPage.title: Coloring Page Directory
DirectoryPage.subtitle: Explore thousands of printable coloring page ideas. Click any link to generate that exact page instantly!
DirectoryPage.metaTitle: Coloring Page Directory - Browse All Categories
DirectoryPage.metaDescription: Browse our extensive collection of free printable coloring pages. Find pages for kids, adults, and every subject imaginable.

PrintablePage.descriptionTemplate: This {subject} coloring page is perfect for {audience}. It features clean lines designed for easy coloring. Use your favorite crayons, markers, or colored pencils to bring it to life!

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: Your privacy is important to us. It is AI Coloring Page's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website.
PrivacyPage.section1Text: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent.
PrivacyPage.section2Text: Images uploaded to our "Magic Camera" feature are processed temporarily to generate your coloring page. We do not sell or trade your personal photos.
PrivacyPage.section3Text: We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors interact with our site. This data is anonymized and used solely to improve the user experience.
PrivacyPage.section4Text: If you have any questions about our privacy policy, please contact us.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.section1Text: By accessing this website, you are agreeing to be bound by these website Terms and Conditions of Use and agree that you are responsible for the agreement with any applicable local laws.
TermsPage.section2Text: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (generated coloring pages) on AI Coloring Page's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing.
TermsPage.section3Text: The materials on AI Coloring Page's website are provided "as is". AI Coloring Page makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties.
TermsPage.section4Text: In no event shall AI Coloring Page or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on AI Coloring Page's website.

StoryMode.metaTitle: Story Mode - Create Custom Coloring Books
StoryMode.metaDescription: Create a consistent 5-page coloring book with your own characters and plot. The world's first AI coloring book generator.
StoryMode.title: Story Mode
StoryMode.subtitle: Create a 5-page coloring book starring your own character!
StoryMode.charDescPlaceholder: e.g. A cute blue robot with a propeller hat
StoryMode.themePlaceholder: e.g. Space Adventure, Underwater, Magic Forest
StoryMode.completeMsg: Your 5-page storybook is ready to print.
StoryMode.shareStoryMsg: Share your story with the world!

LaunchPage.metaTitle: Introducing Magic Camera & Story Mode - AI Coloring Page
LaunchPage.metaDescription: Turn photos into coloring pages and create your own storybooks with our biggest update yet.
LaunchPage.title: Turn Photos into Coloring Pages & Create Your Own Stories
LaunchPage.subtitle: The biggest update to AI Coloring Page is here. Discover Magic Camera, Story Mode, and more.
LaunchPage.magicCameraTitle: üì∏ Magic Camera: Real Life to Line Art
LaunchPage.magicCameraText: Have you ever wanted to color a picture of your own pet, house, or favorite toy? With the new Magic Camera, you can upload any photo, and our AI will instantly convert it into a clean, black-and-white coloring page.
LaunchPage.uploadPhotoText: Upload a photo and see the magic happen.
LaunchPage.storyModeText: Why color just one page when you can create a whole book? Story Mode lets you design a character (like a "Space Cat" or "Detective Dinosaur") and generates a 5-page coloring book featuring them in different scenes.
LaunchPage.generateCharText: Generate a consistent character across 5 pages.
LaunchPage.remixEngineText: Found a page you like but want to change the style? Click the "Remix This" button on any printable page to add your own twist. Turn a realistic lion into a cute cartoon, or add a party hat to a dinosaur.
LaunchPage.exploreText: Explore thousands of free pages or create your own today.

NotFound.title: Oops! Page Not Found
NotFound.description:
We couldn't find the coloring page you were looking for.
It might have been moved, or maybe it never existed.
NotFound.surpriseText: Don't know what to color? Let fate decide!
